## Epic Overview

A high-level description of the major capability or feature set.

## Business Value

Why is this epic important? What business problem does it solve?

## User Stories

List of user stories that will be addressed by this epic:

- [ ] Story 1
- [ ] Story 2
- [ ] Story 3

## Requirements Reference

**Validates Requirements:** [X.Y, X.Z]

## Related Issues

List of issues that are part of this epic:

- [ ] #[issue_number] - [issue_title]
- [ ] #[issue_number] - [issue_title]

## Acceptance Criteria

High-level criteria for epic completion:

- [ ] All related issues completed
- [ ] Integration testing passed
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] User acceptance criteria met

## Technical Architecture

Brief overview of technical approach or architecture changes needed.

## Dependencies

Any dependencies on other epics, external systems, or team decisions.
